overview:
Gary is a partner at SEP. He focuses on investing in technology companies in the oil & gas, environmental and cleantech sectors, as well as cross-sectoral and later stage companies.

Over the past 10 years with SEP, Gary has invested in a wide range of technology businesses, from early through to late stage. His investments include: oil & gas well sensor company, Fotech; and banking software company, Searchspace. He has had a number of successful exits and worked with hospital billings system developer Craneware in the run up to its successful AIM flotation in 2007.

Gary was also closely involved in raising SEPâ€™s most recent fund, SEP III, and maintains an ongoing role in investor relations and fund reporting. In 2006, he was the Vice President of the Scottish Tech Tour.
